location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Account of Broad Cloth and Perpets delivered to Coja Evra Ben Ibrahim (at the request of the Bussora (Basra) Council) from James Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: A list of broad cloths and perpets delivered to Coja Evra Ben Ibrahim. The list gives the amounts and prices of cloths delivered.
